introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description1: By visiting the website borboraqua.am (hereinafter referred to as the "Website") and making purchases, you automatically consent to the collection, processing, and use of your personal data.
introduction.description2: By "Personal Data," we mean any information that allows or may allow us to directly or indirectly identify your identity, such as your name, surname, address, email, phone number, and other data (hereinafter referred to as "Data").
introduction.description3: In this Privacy Policy, "we," "us," and "our" refer to Website (for more information, please visit the "About Us" section), while "you," "your," and "yours" refer to any individual who visits the Website or uses our services.

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Collected Data
informationWeCollect.description: We may collect the following types of information:

items.contact: Contact information – name, surname, address, phone number, email address
items.purchase: Purchase information – products purchased, payment methods
items.technical: Technical information – device type, browser, operating system
items.cookies: Cookies and tracking technologies – for website usage analysis

howWeUse.title: 2. Use of Data
howWeUse.description: Collected data is never sold or provided to third parties for marketing purposes. It is used only for the following purposes:

dataRetention.title: 3. Data Retention Periods
dataRetention.description: Your personal data is stored as follows:

items.account: User account data – as long as the account is active
items.purchase: Purchase history – 5 years (to comply with tax and accounting regulations)
items.marketing: Marketing data – 2 years or until the user opts out

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the protection of your data, including:

items.ssl: SSL encryption – to secure payment and personal data transmission
items.access: Access control – limited access to personal data
items.audits: Regular audits – to detect potential security vulnerabilities

informationSharing.title: 5. Sharing Data with Third Parties
informationSharing.description: We do not sell or provide your data to third parties, except for:

items.shipping: Shipping services – to ensure order delivery
items.payment: Payment systems – for secure payment processing
items.law: Law enforcement authorities – in cases required by law

informationSharing.note: All third parties are obligated to protect your data and cannot use it for other purposes.

items.access: Receive a copy of your personal data
items.edit: Edit or delete your data (through our website settings or customer support)
items.optout: Opt-out of marketing emails (via the "unsubscribe" link in each email)
items.request: Request that your data is not processed for specific purposes, except in cases required by law

cookiesUsage.title: 7. Cookies Usage
cookiesUsage.description: Our website uses cookies to optimize user experience. We use:

items.functional: Functional cookies – to ensure proper website operation
items.analytical: Analytical cookies – to understand user behavior and improve the website
items.marketing: Marketing cookies (only with your consent) – to provide more relevant advertisements

policyChanges.title: 8. Policy Changes
policyChanges.description: We reserve the right to make legally permitted changes to this page and the above sections. Updates will be posted on the Website.
